articles.title: Zelenskyy, European leaders strategize ahead of Trump meeting in Washington
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, along with several European leaders, is set to meet with U.S. President Donald Trump in Washington on Monday, August 18, 2025. The meeting aims to discuss a peace deal for the war in Ukraine, with concerns that Trump might pressure Kyiv into a settlement favorable to Moscow. Zelenskyy previously met with European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen in Brussels.

articles.title: Top news of the day: INDIA bloc considering impeachment motion against CEC Gyanesh Kumar; after Putin, Trump set to meet Zelenskyy, and more
articles.description: Key news headlines for August 18, 2025, include the INDIA bloc considering an impeachment motion against Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar. Additionally, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and European leaders are scheduled to meet with U.S. President Donald Trump in Washington to discuss a peace deal, amidst concerns about potential pressure on Kyiv.

articles.title: Hurricane Erin forecast to create dangerous surf, high winds along US coast
articles.description: Hurricane Erin, currently a Category 4 storm, is expected to intensify and move north, potentially impacting the East Coast with dangerous rip currents and high waves. Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands are assessing damage from the storm. North Carolina has issued a state of emergency for the Outer Banks and a mandatory evacuation for Hatteras Island.
